Reference

All functions

add_formula() remove_formula() update_formula()

Add formula terms to a workflow

add_model() remove_model() update_model()

Add a model to a workflow

add_recipe() remove_recipe() update_recipe()

Add a recipe to a workflow

add_variables() remove_variables() update_variables() workflow_variables()

Add variables to a workflow

augment(<workflow>)

Augment data with predictions

control_workflow()

Control object for a workflow

extract_spec_parsnip(<workflow>) extract_recipe(<workflow>) extract_fit_parsnip(<workflow>) extract_fit_engine(<workflow>) extract_mold(<workflow>) extract_preprocessor(<workflow>)

Extract elements of a workflow

fit(<workflow>)

Fit a workflow object

glance(<workflow>)

Glance at a workflow model

is_trained_workflow()

Determine if a workflow has been trained

predict(<workflow>)

Predict from a workflow

tidy(<workflow>)

Tidy a workflow

axe_call.workflow() axe_ctrl.workflow() axe_data.workflow() axe_env.workflow() axe_fitted.workflow()

Butcher methods for a workflow

pull_workflow_preprocessor() pull_workflow_spec() pull_workflow_fit() pull_workflow_mold() pull_workflow_prepped_recipe()

Extract elements of a workflow

workflow()

Create a workflow

Contents

workflows is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.
